In order to explain ‘nutrition’ in 150 words, I will break it down into a simple definition and a concise explanation of its components. The definition of nutrition is the process by which the body converts food into energy and sustains growth and repair. Nutrition involves the intake of essential nutrients such as carbohydrates, proteins, fats, vitamins, and minerals. Carbohydrates provide energy, proteins build and repair tissues, fats store energy, vitamins and minerals regulate various bodily functions. A well-balanced diet is crucial for maintaining optimal health, preventing chronic diseases, and supporting physical activity. It is essential to consume a variety of whole foods including fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats to ensure adequate nutrition. Adequate nutrition plays a vital role in maintaining overall health and well-being.
